text.tnt-trx-ref-value: But to all who believed him and accepted him, he gave the right to become children of God.

panel.text: Sa lahat ng sa kanya'y nanampalataya at tumanggap, pinagkalooban niya ng karapatang maging anak ng Diyos.

text.tnt-trx-ref-value: God saved you by his grace when you believed. And you can't take credit for this; it's a gift from God... so none of us can boast about it. - Ephesians 2:8-9

panel.text: Iniligtas tayo ng Diyos sapamamagitan ng kanyang biyaya nang tayo ay manampalataya. Ito ay hindi sa inyong sarili; ito ay kaloob ng Diyos... upang walang sinoman ang magmapuri.

text.tnt-trx-ref-value: He saved us, not because of the righteous things we had done, but because of his mercy. He washed away our sins, giving us a new birth and new life. - Titus 3:5

panel.text: Iniligtas niya tayo, hindi dahil sa ating mabubuting gawa kundi dahil sa kanyang habag sa atin. Tayo'y iniligtas niya sa pamamagitan ng Espiritu Santo na naghugas sa atin upang tayo'y ipanganak na muli at magkaroon ng bagong buhay. - Tito 3:5

question.tnt-trx-ref-value: It's not enough just to know or feel that this is true. We have a choice to make...

page.question: Hindi sapat na malaman lamang o maramdaman na ito ay katotohanan. Kinakailangan nating magdesisyon...
